SamPy.wrapper.gf

This Page

  • Show Source

Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

SamPy.wrapper.gfÂ¶

This little wrapper can be used to run GF (R. Somerville’s SAMs program) using threading.

author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:niemi@stsci.edu
note:Threading is not really the best way to do this. Instead, one should use multiprocessing to launch several processes.

Functions

main(input_files[, cores]) Main driver function of the wrapper.

Classes

Run_GF_Threaded(queue[, out_path, ...]) Threaded way of running GF.
